citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:40pm on 23-MAR-
21. No response was received in 30 minutes to a voicemail left on the listed phone as well as ringing the doorbells on the
front door.
End Section

front door.
